criteria: All registration and login E2E tests passing; Password hashing and JWT generation logic peer-reviewed and approved by senior engineer; No high-severity vulnerabilities found by SAST scanner.
success_metrics: Zero security regressions; 100% test pass rate.

criteria: E2E test for logout and token invalidation passes; Email verification flow confirmed functional with a mail-trapping service; Redis integration is stable under load.
success_metrics: Logout flow is 100% reliable; Email delivery is confirmed.

criteria: Automated tests confirm user data is purged from PostgreSQL, OpenSearch, and S3; Deletion is recorded in the immutable audit log; Anonymization of interactive content is verified.
success_metrics: 100% of PII and primary content is deleted; No orphaned data remains.
